author: Anupam Nagar
title: Ahead of the Market: 12 things that will decide stock action on Wednesday
description: A look at what some of the key indicators are suggesting for tomorrow’s market action.
content:
NEW DELHI: A historic collapse in US crude oil prices to below zero level in overnight trade resulted in a knee-jerk reaction in equities the world over and domestic equities too plunged in tandem.
Sensex lost 1011.29 points to 30,636, wiping off some Rs 3.3… [+5465 chars]
